## 2017 Formula 1 Races

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(leaflet)

my_map <- leaflet(data = circuits) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat = latitude, lng = longitude, popup = races, label = sequence)
my_map
```
